H0.text: Who directed the classic 30s western Stagecoach. Raoul Walsh

H1.text: Who directed the classic 30s western Stagecoach. King Vidor

H2.text: Who directed the classic 30s western Stagecoach. William Wyler

H3.text: Who directed the classic 30s western Stagecoach. John Ford

A4.text: Stagecoach is a 1939 American Western film directed by John Ford and starring Claire Trevor and John Wayne.
